com.dotmarketing.listeners

Class TestXmlRingingListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener
      • com.dotmarketing.listeners.TestXmlRingingListener

  • public class TestXmlRingingListener
extends org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener
    Created by Jonathan Gamba. Date: 5/14/12 Class that will listen every event for the jUnit tests, with this class we can handle the way the output will be display it
